website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight yet durable 2-speed, 18-volt drill-driver with a variable speed trigger and a 1/2-inch auto-lock chuck that is designed for lighter tasks.
pros: This drill-driver has a soft-grip handle, an LED work light, and is capable of delivering up to 350 pounds of torque
It is an efficient, affordably-priced drill that works best on wood and light-duty metal applications
cons: The battery performance is a little underwhelming and the drill lacks the convenient battery charge indicator found on some other models

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 13 months.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this thing while it lasted but after 13 months the motor has blown out. I really expected this to last longer, it seemed very well made. I only used it for smaller projects too. It is really light and has a decent amount of torque. My dad has this same one and the larger version and has had no issues so maybe I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Drill, Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased DeWalt in the past and still use them. I needed a lighter yet powerful drill and read reviews on this Bosch. They were good reviews so I took a chance on it and bought it. I'm so happy I did. For a small powerful drill it is easy to hold, manage and get the job done. Such a sweet tool to add to my collection. Buy it people. I have been in the trades for 33 years and I love this drill and so will you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: This power drill is great! And I love that it comes with 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: This power drill is great! And I love that it comes with 2 batteries. Either way the battery does last a long time so the second battery isn't actually super necessary unless you need the power drill for your day-to-day work of course. We've been using this drill almost every other day over several weeks while doing light renovations at our house and it has been great to use. We actually had someone come over to do some work for us and he brought his own drill but he ended up using ours instead because he liked it better! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Funny Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This drill replaced by beloved Makita, for which batteries are no longer available. I used the Bosch once and immediately forgot all about the Makita. Fabulous drill; compact, light and powerful. The batteries charge quickly and maintain a charge for weeks in storage. Putting the worklight on the battery instead of directly behind the chuck was a brilliant idea. Go ahead and buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Maniscalco

customer_reviews.title: Underpower light duty low torque drill
customer_reviews.text: Had the Bosch for a few months now and have used it almost daily for the first month only. This is truly a light duty drill for light work. Fine for wood finish work but that’s it. Can’t be used on the job site. Not enough drill power to bore and dap doors for example. I’m surprised how little real torque the drill has for an 18V. Battery strength and especially life is surprisingly short as well. I rarely used the drill after the first because it’s a waste of time. Very disappointed. Would return but I’ve had it too long.
customer_reviews.author: Retired75th

customer_reviews.title: looks like an opened box!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this drill. As a couple of other people also mentioned, the box was not sealed and it looks like it had already been opened. One battery was already attached and overall this is really disappointing. I know Bosch for years and this is not the first time I'm buying a drill from Bosch. So far I just can tell you that the quality doesn't look like to be like the older Bosch models I had worked with. On the product, I can't comment yet since I requested a replacement with a brand new unopened box. So I'm just waiting to receive the new one and then I can comment on the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Listed as a Reconditioned Tool
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent - it's Bosch. However, it cannot be covered by the Bosch Provantage maintenance warranty because this is a RECONDITIONED TOOL! The fact that it is reconditioned is NOT mentioned in the Amazon listing.
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Mehaffey

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight Drill
customer_reviews.text: I have used this drill a month now and have been very pleased with it. I replaced an older Dewalt and this drill is as powerful but at about half the weight. That make it more pleasant to use. The drill seems to be well made and the battery life is good. It's a two speed drill and the only negative I have with the drill is that I would like to see the second speed a little slower. It is so fast I am not sure I will ever use it. I normally use that speed to drive metal roofing screws.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Wells

customer_reviews.title: Bosch quality
customer_reviews.text: I've always been happy and satisfied with Bosch tools. This small and lightweight drill replaces another Bosch drill that I've had and used extensively over the 10 or so years I've owned it. It was dropped from a ladder more than I'd like to admit, it was accidentally left out in the rain a few times and I have even loaned it out which is something I usually don't do with my tools. It put up with a lot and just kept going. I have no reason to believe this one won't last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Philm

customer_reviews.title: trash
customer_reviews.text: this drill is junk, unless you are using it to put a screw in the wall to hang a picture once every 6 months, you will be disappointed. on my fourth use this drill conked out, completely lost all torque. i made a warranty claim and they sent me the "improved" GSR18V-190. it also broke. if you are looking for something to put thru its paces, look elsewhere because this is not what you want. bosch tools are no longer what they used to be and they do not stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: NorthFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill
customer_reviews.text: I've drilled through dry wall, plaster, concrete, and brick. I've had this thing for like a year and it's still working great. I don't do anything super intense, just install things around the house, but I've recently had to drill into a concrete ceiling and mount a TV on a brick wall and this little guy did great. The super at my building says, oh that's a crappy drill you'll have to get an electric one. Guess who's laughing now, Louie! My drill kicks butt! It conquered all of the walls! No surface stands a chance against it's furious whirling wrath! I really like this drill.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is so good, I wish I had bought one sooner. The Li-ion battery provides all the power i need for jobs, the locking chuck is very easy to close and open and the small size allows mt to use it in tighter spaces than my previous Craftsman drill/driver. The LED light is aimed exactly where i need it and the tool's light weight reduces fatigue. Charging is quick. The only problem is that I may need to buy another one because everyone is borrowing it!
customer_reviews.author: GTBentley

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT chuck is less than satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: This is the forth Bosch drill/drive I've owned. Love the weight, balance, power and long life of battery and the fact that I can interchange the batteries with the numerous other Bosh tools in my shop. However. I bought this tool when the trigger failed on my last unit (It's in the shop for repair). Now I have the new unit and it seems a bit smaller (good thing) but I almost immediately discovered that the chuck provides insufficient grip on an inserted drill bit. That's more than just annoying since it has also contributed to breaking numerous small diameter bits. Not sure what I'll ry next but will likely not be a Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Not new!!
customer_reviews.text: The product felt sturdy and light but the chuck was faulty because I couldn’t get the chuck to grip the bits correctly. The product also came in a non-sealed box as if it was refurbished. There was even some stains in the large pouch. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emre

customer_reviews.title: Electric Drills Have Changed
customer_reviews.text: This drill seems to be a fantastic deal when compared with the drills I have purchased during my life up to this point. Great features and ability for the things I have tried so far. Although it is made in an island-nation, not Japan, It appears to be a quality product. I will look forward to seeing how both of us grow older.
customer_reviews.author: MIKEEXEK

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for latex allergic
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package HOWEVER I had to return it due to the natural rubberized grip all over it. This should be put in the description for the unfortunate latex allergic consumers. It just said soft grip. With that description I figured it was silicone. Wish I had called the Bosch support before I bought it. They were very nice & apologetic. Hopefully they will start putting a warning on the package & online description instead of just the user manual. I'm very disappointed because I really want to keep it. It was perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great little drill/driver gets into tight places and has plenty of torque
customer_reviews.text: As cordless drills go I've used quite a few... from low-end Black and Decker models up to high end Dewalt and Makita ones.. This sits somewhere in-between - offering a nice amount of torque in a small footprint. I've used this for building a small deck and stairs, drilling through metal and plastic and for general purposes to screw and unscrew things around the house and it's tackled all my jobs without skipping a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Denard D. Springle IV

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight drill that’s easy to handle, has good torque, and two long lasting batteries. The keyless chuck seems to be working very well. Nice carrying case. So far it seems to be living up to its Bosch name.
customer_reviews.author: DaveCPP

customer_reviews.title: I loved this drill until I was using it tonight and ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this drill until I was using it tonight and it almost caught on fire. This happened while drilling a hole for a screw in a wood door. It started smoking and throwing sparks. I have only used it maybe 15 times. I was so disappointed, I have asked for a replacement we will see. I will update
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine for the money, real serious users may want the heavy duty model
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little more gutless and flimsy than my other Bosch 18v Li-on drill. Perfect for occasional light use at my work, but the heavier duty model is likely better suited for construction and real abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma Aroma

customer_reviews.title: Great drill with two batteries in a handy case.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one (the first works fine still, I just like to have two because I have a kid who totes my drill off to his projects). Smooth, sturdy, torquey, precise, reasonably lightweight, short enough to fit between two studs in a standard wall. Chuck is easy to tighten and loosen with one hand, feels nice and balanced in my hand. The only negative is that the LED that is supposed to light up your work is kind of blocked by the chuck. But that's super minor, and I certainly got by without any LED on the front of my drills for several decades before this.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Solid drill.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy drill with good battery life. Drill is a bit heavier than some other models which makes it harder to use over an extensive period. Otherwise, I would have given it five stars. The heavier construction will insure it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: William Trahan

customer_reviews.title: Good for a little over a year!!!!!!! Junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gear mechanism quit after a year, started making grinding noise and not turning the bit! Not German quality, drill is made in Malaysia, not Germany! Replacement part is $70, for that plus $50, I am going to buy a DeWalt or Milwalkee so it will last more than a year!
customer_reviews.author: Cushman Ken

customer_reviews.title: high price for junk
customer_reviews.text: Used it for wood is ok. Chucked a 1/2 inch bit in it and drilled through a 1/4 inch steel plate, now it won't chuck anything smaller than 1/2 inch. I have a cheap old Black and Decker I've used for years. No more money for Bosch anything.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Shipley

customer_reviews.title: lasted until just after the warranty ran out
customer_reviews.text: This was a great drill until it let the magic smoke out and died about 3.25 years after I bought it. Just outside the warranty. I was expecting it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: long battery life and great balance. the grip wears on the webbing of ...
customer_reviews.text: long battery life and great balance. the grip wears on the webbing of my thumb when not wearing gloves. the clutch works better than the Dewalt 988 hammer drill that I am used to. it is very precise and allows you to drive screws without crushing the wood. my only real complaint would be that the clutch ring is narrow and hard to adjust without loosening the chuck I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The good, solid feel of Bosch tools
customer_reviews.text: This drill replaced a less expensive model by a different brand, and this Bosch is a pleasure to work with. I like to save the fifth star in the rating for knock-my socks-off quality and performance. You'll see this drill earned that fifth star. When I start drilling or driving screws this device just gives a feeling it is up to the task. Work feels less like work and just a bit more like a zen experience when I the tools give every indication they're up to the task, regardless of what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Whovian Jim

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Sept 2017 & used very little as I'm a 6 month snowbird. Just started a project & smoke pouring out & no speed. Both batteries fully charged per charger. Designed obsolescence? Not even a full months use! Bosh has repaired the drill & extended the warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Hisierrabob

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Bosch charger for my impact drill/driver in a move. Went to replace it and it was $49.00 on Amazon. Instead, for 30 bucks more, I got this kit that included, in addition to the charger, a matching power drill and two extra batteries. Thank you Bosch!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrol Navigator

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for more than 20 minutes- junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model a couple years ago and the clutch quit the very first time I used it. I’ve had the replacement in my closet and used it today for the first time and it self destructed as well. Do not buy this as it won’t work around the house the first time. Customer service offered to review repairing the drill and mentioned they would file an internal issue.
customer_reviews.author: mark blackford

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: Building a barn using pine 2x4's. The day I got the drill I put it into use drilling holes and putting in up to 3-1/2 inch wood screws. Worked all day on one battery. Drove screws- drove screws- drove screws. Great job! After six days the drill continues to amaze me. Not a single problem. One additional thing... I dropped it to the ground from waist high. Nothing broke. Love my new drill!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but has a funny sound like the gears aren't meshing properly and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but has a funny sound like the gears aren't meshing properly and the forward/reverse switch is to stiff. I have to hold in one hand and use the other to push the button. I have another Bosch about three years old and it still sounds new and works great. Too bad, going back to my previous brand on my next purchase. Are companies just "cheapening down" their products.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, versatile drill!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drill so far! Angled light exposes your workspace, lightweight but feels very sturdy and strong, battery life is good for light use! Compared to the multitude of Craftsman drills I've used for the past 15 years, this thing feels like a great improvement for small to moderate duty jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S Webb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drill kit
customer_reviews.text: Comes with an extra battery and a nice soft-sided case. It was packaged very well and arrived in a timely manner. Very pleased with this gift -- to myself -- for Father's Day! Needed a new cordless drill and am happy I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I'm really a big fan of Bosch cordless products. ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really a big fan of Bosch cordless products. I wanted to get 2 extra new batteries. It was basically cheaper to get this whole set up. Now I have 2 models of cordless drill/drivers and a jigsaw. Cordless Circular saw is next. Long lasting lithium batteries, powerful tools that help me get all my projects done.
customer_reviews.author: Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well made, durable construction. The price is right and very reasonable. And battery technology has definitely improved over the last 4-5 years because this drill lasts a lot longer than my old drill. Very happy with this product. Bosch always makes good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ace2010

customer_reviews.title: Bosch is great
customer_reviews.text: Really like this drilll. Powerful, but lighter than the others. Had a small problem with it and Bosch addressed it with no hassle. Great company
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bosch a quality product as expected
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth over determining if I should drop some serious coin on Makita or DeWalt, etc.. and then ended up deciding on trying the Bosch. I felt I needed a high quality drill for a project I was doing on my BMW M4 and I further thought how poetic it would be to be drilling on my German made car with a German made tool! lol. Ultimately this drill proved to be worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: seemed good.
customer_reviews.text: Drill had mechanical issue with the Chuck, tightened by hand but couldn't loosen with tools. Chuck developed play and slip. But, the drill might have been already returned by another customer. Charger is huge and mostly empty space - design could have been smaller. Otherwise, seemed good.
customer_reviews.author: DJ in Minneapolis

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid drill that suits my needs for casual usage. I was concerned that it would be too heavy and bulky for my purposes, but that hasn't been a problem. The large footprint of the battery/charger combination relative to other drills I've seen is a small inconvenience, but easy to live with.
customer_reviews.author: Techview

customer_reviews.title: A Great drill/driver
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to hold and use, and how quick to change from drill to driver and back with just a twist to lock and unlock the bit. And the battery life is amazing! So far it's been a good workhorse as we build large shelves in the garage, and repair our deck and railing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sand

customer_reviews.title: Great household drill
customer_reviews.text: Great small drill for everyday household jobs. Quite powerful with lots of torque. Nice design and packaging. Bosch makes an electric screwdriver only (not to be used as drill). Made the mistake of buying that first. If you buy this you don't need the stand-alone screwdriver. This drill is a little pricey but it will last for years. I have had cheap drills and they are not worth anything.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, Balance and Power!
customer_reviews.text: Bosch tools are great! This drill/driver is compact yet powerful! Nice, smooth gearing and good gripping chuck. Great value compared to those red or yellow brands. We use a Bosch jig saw at work that is over 35 years old, still runs great after only minor repairs (brushes)!
customer_reviews.author: GMPullman

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great driver/drill.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for one project (building my kids' tree fort/playhouse) but it makes holes & puts screws in just fine. Terrific upgrade from my old B&D NiCad. The case is flimsy but I wasn't expecting much. If I have to find a flaw I'll say that the torque setting for screws seems a little uneven -- at the same setting, sometimes it sets the screw flush, sometimes it pulls it 1/4" below the surface of the wood before I have to stop myself. But it's lightweight, powerful, and the batteries hold plenty of juice & recharge quickly.
customer_reviews.author: WBlank

customer_reviews.title: ... since purchase for small jobs quality seems to be good, no malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: Have only used twice since purchase for small jobs quality seems to be good, no malfunctions. Like having 2 batteries. Will update as I use for more projects. Update: used to rebuild back deck 12 x 16, and a new front deck 6 x 8. Rock solid operation long battery life between both batteries lasted all day approx 8 hours. Obviously not straight 8 hours, used to build a set of 3 stringer stairs for each deck, drill and screw down deck boards, build skirting and screw vinyl lattice work to the skirting.
customer_reviews.author: rams99

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good drill. Comes with two batteries and a charger that can be stored in a bosche style nylon case. The charger feels kind of cheap and light for it's size, but does it's job. Would recommend overall, especially for it's fair price.
customer_reviews.author: tymarbry

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits slip.
customer_reviews.text: So it is fairly compact and light for a drill. However whenever the drill bit bites the bit just spins in the jaws. You can never seem to get the bit right enough. Personally I think the jaws are a poor design or something.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought as housewarming gift for daughter and it’s working out well for us both. Easy for her to use now and should be capable enough to keep up with her. Task light is well designed. Brushless motor meant less maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: RED RUMGE

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: As a home, non-pro, user, this drill meets and surpasses expectations. Does everything asked to do with good battery life and adequate torque power.
customer_reviews.author: NY Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid drill/driver
customer_reviews.text: The package, with two batteries, appealed to me and the price was right. This tool probably won't stand up to the every-day use and abuse of a builder or handyman, but it has been very good for me and my projects.
customer_reviews.author: Portland Fella

customer_reviews.title: Works well, price was great.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale, and it does everything I could want in a cordless drill. I have the idea that Bosch makes quality stuff, and It seems that way in my hand. Like that extra battery a lot. I'm happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: My 1st power tool... works well. ...
customer_reviews.text: My 1st power tool...works well....except it didn't come with any drill or driver bits...had to go out and figure out what to buy to be able to use it...a bit of a nuisance...you'd figure for almost a hundred dollars they could include a starter "bit kit!"
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Performance
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Bosch tool and after wearing the first one out, I knew I couldnt go wrong with another. Fortunately this one uses the same battery as my last one so now I have four batteries to rotate through the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Marvet John

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Powerful W/3 years warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have several other Bosch tools and have only had one fail, but it lasted for almost 5 years. I used that drill a lot.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gene Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Totally Unreliable Drill
customer_reviews.text: Nice drill. But literally stopped working after a couple simple jobs. Unfortunately, I seldom used the drill so I have not been able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: milnerb1

customer_reviews.title: Small compact size  and plenty of power..
customer_reviews.text: It has the quality one will expect from BOSCH....the stylish carrying case is really not much of use only if one displays same in the living room...!?
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: For the price I honestly can't complain. It's been ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price I honestly can't complain. It's been treating me well and it gets plenty of projects done. The only thing is it has a tough time doing anything besides screws and such. If I try drilling into anything besides plaster it barely musters through it
customer_reviews.author: Logan Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The clutch went out two times. Just driving screws through sheet-rock (drywall).
customer_reviews.author: Leon Threet

customer_reviews.title: Bosch cordless electric drill is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: For me it's a little cumbersome since I have arthritis but I have it to my son in law and daughter and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L Congdon

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this drill.
customer_reviews.text: I am a divorced grandma. I bought this drill for my projects around the house. This drill of the best drill one ever owned. The price was just right. I absolutely love it. Could come with some more bits tho. Smile
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Two batteries and a drill; can't get any better deal then this!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a drill and wanted to expand my tools again. after analyzing some combo kits, etc. buying refurbished units without batteries were cheaper. In addition buying this gets me two lithium ion batteries. Its a win win and very cost effective purchase
customer_reviews.author: D. T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of battery drills. This is the best. Powerful, sturdy, comfortable to hold. Works hard and well. Light weight is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Szava-kovats

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Poweful, compact size, handy weight. The trigger is controllably variable. I bought this to use in handyman jobs around the house, perfect. I like the chuck on this Bosch. What's not to like? You buy one and you'll appreciate this drill.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday drill. Plenty of power for home owner who needs dependable tools. Works as good as drills with high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Aultz

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Chuck will not grip drill bit properly. Drill bit keeps loosening. This Bosch power drills quality has gone down hill from the other one that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: awesome. batteries hold their charge for months. decent torque, and holds in your hand nicely. decent case, quality item from Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: slackerchef

customer_reviews.title: Good drill...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drill for my husband’s birthday and so far he is very happy with it. Used it a few times since he got it and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DKD

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: This Bosch cordless drill/driver has been a huge time saver and has become one of my favorite tools to use. Lithium ion batteries do not lose their charge so this drill is ready to use whenever I need it. This drill is not heavy duty or commercial strength, Instead, this drill is made to the same high standards as all Bosch products. You might find a cordless drill as good as this Bosch, but you will not find one better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: a great tool
customer_reviews.text: It has good torque and keeps on drilling. I have had it for 3 or 4 years with no complaints. I have been using non-cordless drills professionally for decades. This is the first cordless that I have had that could keep up with corded drills.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect. Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it was not as advertised. The 18v battery was a step lower (won't run as long) as was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Auditman

customer_reviews.title: Good Drill....  so good I now have 2
customer_reviews.text: This is a little "lighter duty" than my previous 8yr old Bosch 18v drill but works fine. You WILL need more RPM on this drill than the older one to do the same job though. This drill is quite a bit lighter than my previous model and my wife appreciates that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cordless drill that I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cordless drill that I have ever owned. I had a Craftsman that lasted over 10yrs and a DeWalt that didn't last 2yrs. So, far this is the lightest and fastest charging drill I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W. Parrett

customer_reviews.title: It's an excellent drill; plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: I've just used this drill (along with a Nyalox grinding wheel) to take off a lot of excess grout. It's an excellent drill; plenty of power, batteries recharge quickly; everything feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing Wombat

customer_reviews.title: Great as I expected from bosch even their dishwashers are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great as I expected from bosch even their dishwashers are great I wish I could afford a Bosch washer/gasdryer the drill is very light and seems strong as a bull I bought it as a gift for a poor carpenter who helped get my house livable after SANDY distroyed it he loves it and plans to get all bosch tools from now on .I have several older ones and they are still running strong
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This small drill does the job works great Bosch has done it again as always great price .
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! So easy to use but still powerful. Switching bits is simple and I haven't even charged mine yet after installing blinds on my whole first floor upon taking it out of the box. Portable/cordless and comes with handy extra battery, an extremely useful tool for the household.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Raife

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for any better.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and powerfully. Quiet and smooth. Brake works top notch. When you release trigger it stops on a dime.
customer_reviews.author: cqc598

customer_reviews.title: Nice power, long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how long the batter lasts. I used it all day on a Saturday project and never swapped out the battery. Nice power, easy swapping out bits. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight for 1/2 in Drill
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight for 1/2 in drill. Product same as in store, but can save a little money. Very long battery charge. Had to purchase the drill bits separately. Luckily they were on sale at Lowes. Bosch brand. Fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hans A.

customer_reviews.title: Small, managable, reliable
customer_reviews.text: This drill is shockingly small for the power and endurance, it is so much better than my older, larger, clunkier drill. For most everyday purposes, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: WillfromNO

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Great drill for home use. The battery life is very long. And a great value.
customer_reviews.author: michael y.

customer_reviews.title: Same experience as a previous reviewer: This drill kit ...
customer_reviews.text: Same experience as a previous reviewer: This drill kit had been opened and then put back in its box. Carry case had "gunk" on it. One battery and the charger were not wrapped. Chuck system was faulty. Grinding noise the few times it actually spun. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: frequent customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes really good holes!
customer_reviews.text: Great drill. Has worked great on a few projects I've worked on around the house. Battery charge seems to really last. Lightweight and small. Really good when working in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: The Hs

customer_reviews.title: chuck came off
customer_reviews.text: This drill came apart after 8 uses. The chuck came off and bearings fell out. I have owned Bosch tools for 20 years but this is terrible. So far have also been unable to get through to Amazon. One star only because i was forced to just to write a review
customer_reviews.author: Robert Laux

customer_reviews.title: A great compromise between power and small size
customer_reviews.text: A great compromise between power and small size. Comes with two batteries so you can have one on the charger as you work with the other. Also, it charges super fast.
customer_reviews.author: soaringbird

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the new home owner needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed to tackle some home improvement projects in my first home. Carrying case makes keeping everything together and transporting a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa @honeybeeMKG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool. The Ion batteries really last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems great quality
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say on longevity or battery life, but so far I love this drill. I've used it multiple times already without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For The Occasional DIY'er
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the tool tote kit in the house. Small, lightweight and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Knows - Usually :-)

customer_reviews.title: Good light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light and powerful. Good amount of torque and last for a long time. Light that shines on the target is nice. I would prefer a hard case but price is right. On the a bit negative, I feel that chuck is a bit touchy and need a good tightening. Overall good upgrade for my older Dewalt 12V.
customer_reviews.author: Felix G

customer_reviews.title: Bosch is the Rolls Royce of tools
customer_reviews.text: Bosch is the Rolls Royce of tools, every thing from the tool itself to the storage pouch and packaging, all quality! The price is very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: May I Offer You A Hand

customer_reviews.title: I’ve wanted to buy one of these for ages. This one is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: My father constantly uses my tools and loses random pieces. I have this locked away so my dad can’t get to them.
customer_reviews.author: Saturn K

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I had the same issue as other users had here where the drill stopped working after 1.5yrs. The internal drive thing blew out and makes sparks when you use it. Obviously the Warranty is only 1yr so I can't do anything about it. I am thinking about going with another brand to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Keval Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great drill, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, powerful drill. Keeps a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Keeton

customer_reviews.title: It's a Bosch and works like a Bosch tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal--spare battery and charger along with the unit and battery itself.
customer_reviews.author: jdkinman

customer_reviews.title: Lets Gitter Done!
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as my old drill but still a gteat drill. Well worth the price. Great quality product. I will be using this drill a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Solid Well-Made Light-Weight Drill
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is light weight enough to comfortably hold for a long time without my arm getting tired (unlike some others I've used in the past). Charges easily and quickly. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: lalicorne

customer_reviews.title: This drill is lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This drill is lightweight and easy to use, especially good for females since some of the other drills out there are really heavy. The extra battery is very convenient and the battery life is great. I've already used it multiple times, to hang shelves, fix broken furniture, etc. I haven't used it for heavy duty building so I can't speak to that. I like that it comes in a handy storage bag to keep everything together and I love the teal color.
customer_reviews.author: Carefmrn

customer_reviews.title: good weight
customer_reviews.text: works well. have not used extensively yet. so far plenty of power for bolts and screws. Battery held charge.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: REALLY long lasting charge
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cordless drill I have owned (and I have owned 5 or 6). Lots of power and a REALLY long lasting charge.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Craig Jr.

product_meta.title: Bosch Power Tools Drill Driver Kit DDB181-02 - 18V Cordless Drill/Driver Tool Set with 2 Lithium Ion Batteries, 18 Volt Charger, & Soft Carry Contractor Bag
product_meta.description: The Bosch DDB181 02 is the industry's most compact and lightest weight 18 Volt basic duty 1/2 inch drill/driver. With its compact and lightweight design, professionals can drill or drive fasteners overhead or in tight spaces fatigue free. More compact than many competitive 12 Volt tools, It is ideal for electricians, plumbers and HVAC tradesman looking for a solution that not only fits in their pouch, but also can handle most everyday tasks with 18 Volt battery power. The Ddb181 works at two speeds 400 RPM and 1, 300 RPM (No load) and provides 350 inch/pounds of torque, which is enough to drive most common fasteners and drill bits. Kit contents: (1) DDB181 02 1/2 inch compact drill/driver, (1) screw driving bit, (2) 1.5 Ah slim pack batteries, (1) charger, (1) contractor bag
feature_bullets: Compact: Most compact cordless 18 Volt power drill driver, 3 pounds Of lightweight design allows for optimal handling in even the tightest spaces
Light Weight : Lightest weight 18V electric battery powered compact drill driver for more efficiency and less fatigue during the toughest impact drilling or screw driving applications
High Torque & Speed: High torque and speed at only 3 pounds, The Bosch DDB181 02 Provides 350 pounds Of optimized torque for powerful fastening and 1,300 RPM for fast, efficient power drilling
Convenience: Includes LED Light illuminating the darkest work spaces and contractor bag for portability making it the complete power tool
Variable Speed: 2 speed transmission, one for heavy duty projects and one for speed, both provide optimized torque and efficiency for powerful screw driving and precise drilling
